episodes.synopsis: Evans finds DNA analysis that suggests Elvis Presley could have suffered from a genetic heart disease that may have led to his tragic death.
episodes.title: Shoplifters 1

episodes.synopsis: Evans investigates John F. Kennedy and Marilyn Monroe using DNA samples from their hair, and also tracks down Napoleon's penis in New Jersey.
episodes.title: Shoplifters 2

episodes.synopsis: Along with a tooth of John Lennon's, Evans tracks down bones and hair purported to be Adolf Hitler's and Eva Braun's, which offer surprising results.
episodes.title: Shoplifters 3

video.title: Dead Famous DNA
video.synopsis: Host Mark Evans tracks down partial remains of famous figures and uses cutting-edge DNA analysis to learn more about what genetically made them tick.
